sourcesContent:
Nome do Curso {{element.name}} Categoria {{element.category}}
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Curso} from "./curso"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ ListaCursos: Curso[] = [ {_id: '1', name: 'nome1', category: 'categoria1'} ]; displayedColumns = ['nome', 'categoria']; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } title = 'crud-angular'; }
